vooga.towerdefense.gameelements

Class GameElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • vooga.towerdefense.util.Sprite
      • vooga.towerdefense.gameelements.GameElement

  • public class GameElement
extends Sprite
    Underlying game element object that all types of sprites in the game are Defined by its attributes and actions
    Author:
    Matthew Roy, Xu Rui, Zhen Gou
